text: The Second Division is geographically divided into 5 zones. The winners of each zone are automatically promoted into the First Division. The bottom finishers of each zone lose professional status and are relegated into the Amateur Football League. ==South== ===Standings=== ===Top scorers=== ;22 goals * Karen Sargsyan (FC Dynamo Stavropol) ;17 goals * Ivan Luzhnikov (FC Chernomorets Novorossiysk) ;16 goals * Vladimir Shipilov (FC Chernomorets Novorossiysk) ;14 goals * Vladimir Serov (FC Rotor Volgograd) * Georgi Smurov (FC
